name: Select Target Word
description: Identify the specific word from the user-provided list that will be the focus for finding associated words.
expected_output: The selected target word that will be analyzed.

name: Identify Associated Words
description: Analyze the selected target word and identify the three words that are best associated with it from the provided list.
expected_output: A list of three words that are best associated with the target word.

name: Prepare Results
description: Compile the identified associated words into a formatted output for presentation.
expected_output: A structured response containing the target word and its three associated words.
